message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. It comes with a comprehensive set of features that cater to various needs and preferences. Given its unique value proposition, I am offering it to you for $2000000. I believe this price reflects not only the cost of production but also the premium value it offers. I look forward to your consideration.

I appreciate the introduction to the product, and I'm interested in purchasing it. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value and the features you mentioned.
